title: Chocolate chip marbled cookies
ingredients: ['225g butter', '225g caster sugar', '100g dark brown soft sugar', '2 eggs', '275g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '150g dark chocolate chips', '75g cocoa powder', '1/2 teaspoon almond extract']
